ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Guild in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: An example of this..  I received the same messages from the paladins guild at Freeport.  So.. I killed Deathfist Orcs.  It took about 30 of them to finally
ygData.messageBody:
An example of this.. I received the same messages from the paladins guild at Freeport. So.. I killed Deathfist Orcs. It took about 30 of them to finally raise my faction enough for the paladins to complete their dialogue.

Hope thats helpful.

Drev

> ----------
> From: McGraw, T. David[SMTP:Mcgraw.Thomas@...]

> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Guild in Freeport
>
> From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
>
> Go kill the Deathfist orcs in the east commons. I am not sure if it helps
> with your wizard faction but I know it helps with your basic Freeport one.
>
> Yours,
>
> ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
